repositorySubmission.title: Submit GitHub Repository
repositorySubmission.description: Submit your GitHub repositories for code audit and security analysis.

info.title: Important Information
info.item1: Only public GitHub repositories are supported at this time.
info.item2: The audit process may take several hours to complete.
info.item3: You will be notified when the audit is complete.
info.item4: You can check the status of your submissions on the Repository Status page.

success.title: Repositories Submitted Successfully
success.message: Your repositories have been submitted for audit. You can check the status on the Repository Status page.

error.title: Submission Error
error.noRepositories: Please enter at least one repository URL.
error.invalidUrls: One or more repository URLs are invalid. Please ensure they are in the format: https://github.com/owner/repo
error.notAuthenticated: You need to be logged in to submit repositories.
error.submissionFailed: Failed to submit repositories. Please try again later.

repositoryStatus.title: Repository Status
repositoryStatus.description: View the status of your submitted repositories and audit results.
repositoryStatus.searchPlaceholder: Search by repository name or owner...
repositoryStatus.noRepositories: You haven't submitted any repositories yet.
repositoryStatus.noMatchingRepositories: No repositories match your search criteria.

error.title: Error
error.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch repositories. Please try again later.

repositoryResult.title: Repository Audit Results
repositoryResult.description: Detailed security audit results for your repository.
repositoryResult.implementationNote: This is a placeholder for the actual audit results display. In a real implementation, the audit_result JSON data would be parsed and displayed in a more user-friendly format.

noResults.title: No Audit Results Available
noResults.message: The audit for this repository has not been completed yet or no results are available.

error.title: Error
error.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch repository details. Please try again later.

github.privateRepoNotice: For private repositories, please grant access to our GitHub account @chainfox-security so we can review your code.
